data.name: Soundscape VR
data.detailed_description:
Soundscape VR is a 24/7 VR music festival that lets you meet up with friends and other music lovers across the globe face to face in audio-reactive music venues where you can have a next-generation concert experience from the comfort and convenience of your own home. Play your favorite music inside your own private music venue to immerse yourself in a 360-degree world of breathtaking visuals. Lights, lasers, particles, and more will come to life as you teleport through space and time, creating an endless stream of visuals in this interactive sandbox world. You haven’t heard your favorite songs until you've experienced them in Soundscape.


Coming with the release of the new Soundscape Universe expansion, you can access multiplayer social worlds where you'll be able to choose between listening to special sets from top artists delivered in partnership with Soundscape, user-created mixes and synchronized playlists hosted by curators, or your own music simultaneously in a virtual silent disco. The music makes the world of Soundscape VR come alive, creating a mind-melting audiovisual experience with millions of unique combinations.


Customize your avatar to reflect your digital persona while you chat, dance, and play “face-to-face” in public venues or private listening parties. Exploring the vast panorama and digital landscape of Soundscape VR reveals a virtual world unlike any other, full of imaginative art, impossible settings, and limitless ways to play.


We've partnered with festival favorite artists, some of the most talented acts on the planet, to deliver you and your friends music in the ultimate way. Jam, Funk, Hip-Hop, Bass, Indie, EDM, Chill, Psych Rock, and much, much more are all headed your way, with new releases happening regularly.


Soundscape VR includes a multiplayer rhythm game where you can shoot and slice their way through the interactive venues to your favorite songs, competing against up to 8 players at a time to see who can cause the most destruction. There are no beatmaps to be made, no limited songs to choose from, you can play any music you want from Beethoven to Skrillex and everything works automatically!


In a world where unsavory tech companies are increasingly using you as a product, we feel compelled to mention that even though Soundscape VR is free, we do not sell any of your data, period. We're extremely focused on user privacy, and are honored that you're here with us to enjoy this music revolution. Be sure to check out our Discord at https://discord.gg/8cfHAEb to join in with the Soundscape music community and discover new music and friends every day, and for all the latest news and updates about new artist releases.

data.short_description: Soundscape VR is the musical metaverse, a collection of audio-reactive social VR worlds to enjoy music, paint, fly, play, explore and more - alone, with friends, or with other fans. Shoot & slice your way through this sonic-visual adventure to your favorite songs as the music makes the world come alive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 3570k or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 6900k / ryzen 1600x or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

package_groups.name: subscriptions
package_groups.title: Buy Soundscape VR Subscription Plan
package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.

subs.option_description: 24,99€ at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at 24,99€.
